entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:48 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then west 40 gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
